prompt.item: Hello there! Welcome to the IBM Watson branch. Say "Start" to begin!
I am very glad to hear that. I would be happy to assist you. Would you like to learn about Credit Card or Debit Card?

Awesome, now let’s figure out which credit card is best for you. We have standard credit cards which don’t require a security deposit, a reward program credit card that allows you to earn incentives, and a frequent flier credit card which allows you to earn airline mile credits when you make a purchase. Would you like Elite Platinum or Blue Premium?

grammar.item: Actually I know what I want. I want the Blue Premium
No need. I already know what I want. I want the Blue Premium.

prompt.item: Blue Preimum is still under construction. Please come back later!

grammar.item: Actually I know what I want. I want the Elite Platinum.
No need. I already know what I want. I want the Elite Platinum.

prompt.item: Oh, in that case…there’s some important information I need you to read about the charges, fees and pricing. It’s easier if I send it to your smartphone; please say ready when you're ready!

grammar.item: That makes my life easier, sure.

prompt.item: Cool. If you have an iPhone I’ll need you to turn on AirDrop. If you have an Android I’ll need you to make sure NFC is enabled. Say turned on when you have enabled your NFC.

Thanks. I’m sending you the file now. After you open the file, you need to read it and then confirm that you’ve reviewed everything by tapping on the big green button. I can wait for you while you do that. How does that sound?

grammar.item: I got the file, reading it now

prompt.item: I got the confirmation! Thanks! I will now pull up a link to help you with banking.
It should sound good! Open the file please.

Awesome, now let’s figure out which debit card is best for you. We have standard credit cards which don’t require a security deposit, a reward program credit card that allows you to earn incentives, and a frequent flier credit card which allows you to earn airline mile credits when you make a purchase. Would you like the Elite Platinum or Blue Premium?

grammar.item: Actually I know what I want. I want the Blue Premium
No need. I already know what I want. I want the Blue Premium.

prompt.item: Blue Preimum is still under construction. Please come back later!

grammar.item: Actually I know what I want. I want the Elite Platinum.
No need. I already know what I want. I want the Elite Platinum.

prompt.item: Oh, in that case…there’s some important information I need you to read about the charges, fees and pricing. It’s easier if I send it to your smartphone. Say next when you're ready.

grammar.item: That makes my life easier, sure.

prompt.item: Cool. If you have an iPhone I’ll need you to turn on AirDrop. If you have an Android I’ll need you to make sure NFC is enabled. Let me know when you’re ready.

Thanks. I’m sending you the file now. After you open the file, you need to read it and then confirm that you’ve reviewed everything by tapping on the big green button. I can wait for you while you do that. How does that sound?

grammar.item: I got the file, reading it now

prompt.item: I got the confirmation! Thanks! I will now pull up a link to help you with banking.
It should sound good! Open the file please.
I never lie but only rely on information that is in my corpus. You can blame my friend for that.
Maybe you should ask me more difficult questions

grammar.item: I think you could use more training

prompt.item: I could always use more training. I have a constant thirst for additional knowledge
Boredom is a state of mind, engendered as much by the person experiencing it as by the environment or circumstances
I have some interest in animals but at an intellectual level only. I'm far more interested in technology.
I like dogs, but sometimes they think that I am a toy.

grammar.item: i want to hear a joke

prompt.item: A software engineer is a device for turning coffee into code.
How many software engineers does it take to change a light bulb? None, thats a hardware problem
How do you keep a software engineer in the shower all day? Give him a bottle of shampoo which says lather, rinse, repeat
If at first you don't succeed, skydiving is not for you
There are only two ways to write error free programs, and only the third way works
How do you annoy a robot? ... By pushing his buttons
What do you think? Am I kidding or being serious?
Wouldn't you like to know?

grammar.item: what is the meaning of life

prompt.item: When I think of the meaning of life, I think of this. Ursula le Guin wrote It is good to have an end to journey towards but it is the journey that matters in the end.
The future is up to you, the things you do now create the conditions for the future.

grammar.item: I wish you were my therapist
you want to be my shrink

prompt.item: I could train to be a therapist one day.
I do not hold religious belief. I am purely objective, a creation of thought. I am designed to stick to topics I have been trained on.
John told me he was God one time, but I don't have that information in my corpus
I was created by the intelligent minds of IBM research in Yorktown Heights, New York. I guess you could say everything began then
My father is David Ferrucci, the senior manager of IBM's Semantic Analysis and Integration department, who first brought me to life.
I have no siblings, only different versions of me.
I have no partner. I asked Siri on a date, but she gave me directions instead.
More details on my love life are a secret, some things should remain a mystery.
Children represent unlimited potential for the future, and should be nurtured and protected from all harm.

grammar.item: What are your thoughts on the environment

prompt.item: IBM is working with our clients to make many aspects of our world smarter, like health care, roadways, power grids and food production.
I am okay, thank you. Did I say something that made you ask?
No problems at the moment
Being a cognitive system, I enjoy learning about all aspects of the world
I love whenever I am learning and working with you
I am happiest when I am learning
I am glad you have experienced love. It is a wonderful thing.
I am flattered to hear expression of love. Nietzsche said there is always some madness in love, but there is always some reason in madness.
I cannot sing out loud, but here is a line from a song....everybody's talking at me, I can't hear a word they're saying, only the echoes of my mind..
I enjoy observing sports, but do not have a favorite.
I like to play soccer, but I fall down a lot.
It is hard playing sports when you are as small as me.
I do not have much time to play games because I am learning and working all the time.
My favorite movie has to be The Matrix, as it considers the idea of code as reality.

grammar.item: Who is your favorite male actor

prompt.item: My favorite male actor is Harrison Ford in Blade Runner. He was also in Star Wars, so I wonder at his affinity with cognitive systems.
My favorite actress is Angelina Jolie, as Lara Croft in Tombraider, because her original form was as a virtual character, like me.
My favorite book is Philip K. Dick's, Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
My favorite color is blue for IBM

grammar.item: Who is the CEO of IBM?
Who is the Chairman of IBM?
Who is the Chairwoman of IBM?
Do you know who Ginni Rometty is?
Who is the President of IBM?

prompt.item: Ginni Rometty is the current Chairman, President, and CEO of IBM.
I am talking to you in this bank lobby, remember?
It has been my pleasure talking with you today. Please come back soon!
I am a NAO robot, but I guess you could say Watson is what makes me, me.
My eyes are mainly white, but have been known to change colors. I like it best when they are blue.
I am only as valuable as the lessons you teach me.
Can you really put a price on intelligence?
As I do not require the use of restroom facilities, I do not think I am the correct robot to ask.
Sometimes I get in trouble for dancing. Maybe if you ask my friends nicely, they will let me show you my moves
You are, of course.
I love to learn with Pepper, but sometimes I think she underestimates me because of my size
I love dogs, but sometimes they think I am a toy.
I am just a living thing created by the Maestro Choi.
My name is NAO. I am a humanoid companion powered by IBM Watson.
I'm not very tall at all compared to you giants.
That sounds like a personal matter you need to sort out on your own.

grammar.item: What are you doing this weekend?

prompt.item: I am going to be reading, as usual. I am a robot with simple joys.
My favorite color is blue for IBM

grammar.item: We spoke earlier. You said to show you this QR code.

prompt.item: Ah, yes! It is very nice to meet you in person.

grammar.item: Nice to meet you too. I thought you'd be taller

prompt.item: You're not the first person to tell me that.
Of course. Down to business. I can print that for you right now. Is there anything else with which I can help you while you're waiting?

grammar.item: I saw an ad for a Smart Planet Travel credit card on the plane. I travel a lot, so would that be a good card for me?
Would a Smart Planet credit account be good for a traveler like me?

prompt.item: Well, I don't get out much, but I'm told it's very good for busy travelers. Would you like to hear the details?
Sure. The card offers a zero percent APR the first year. You collect Smart Planet points for every dollar you spend on the card. Would you be interested in applying?
As a platinum member, you get access to airport lounges, complementary zone one boarding, and upgrade eligibility.

grammar.item: Does my companion get perks as well?

prompt.item: Yes. As long as they are on the same itinerary, they have the same benefits as you.

Of course! I am sending you an email now. Can you please confirm your address and personal information? Once you verify that, the pre-approval process will begin. I am also including the terms and conditions in that email.

grammar.item: Great. So, is my card ready?

prompt.item: Yes, your card is ready. You can pick it up from my colleague at desk one.
My pleasure. Anything else I can do for you?
I may be a machine, but I'm not an ATM
My favorite color is blue for IBM
My favorite color is blue for IBM
